channel.title: Hm, Hoster
channel.description:
Okay, I would like to find someone that would be intrested in hosting my server.
Someone with the following-- I'd like for you too know something about hosting. Be trusted by me and the community Have a decent pc so we don't have too much lag/none. Be able too host it around 8+ hours a day EVERYDAY. ...
You may be asking why I can't host, My pc want handle it right now.
...
What do you get for hosting, Onwer for the server [as I want owner also]/ or if you'd assume hosting it for free thats fine, but I can't pay thru rs or paypal, so this is the only way to do it.
PM or Post.

item.title: Hm, Hoster

i would but i cant get the servers online for some reason

item.title: Hm, Hoster
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

eczema3:

this is BS tbh… either host your own, or buy a dedi.

yup,only leecher noob will want to host your server for that long,
and they havnt a clue how to host,the minute u give them the server they’ll block u
on msn or w/e
